name: LIGHTNESS (Gigoia Studios)
description:
LIGHTNESS  IS  A VIRTUAL  ART SPACE  WITH AN  ORIGINAL  COLLECTION OF   ABSTRACT LIVING PAINTINGS.

Sixty (60)  paintings connects you with the spiritual realm, based on the sayings of Chinese philosopher Lao Tze  (531  B.C.).

You can walk around the Art Gallery rooms and look calmly at the meditative colour-changing paintings. Music is carefully crafted to immerse you in a deep  experience.

A SHORT, CONTEMPLATIVE EXPERIENCE FOR FINE ARTS LOVERS!

For $3.50 you get the game + LIGHTNESS SOUNDTRACK ALBUM  with complete 7 delightful meditative ambient tracks!

Playing time: 20 minutes or more. 

If you liked the LIGHTNESS  virtual painting collection, you can buy Wall Art posters, home decor, T-shirts, bags and yoga mats: https://society6.com/gigoiastudios

FOLLOW US at Twitter and Instagram:  @gigoiastudios

SUBSCRIBE OUR YOUTUBE CHANNEL: https://www.youtube.com/c/Gigoiastudiosgames

Recommended  hardware  requirements:   Processor: 1,4 GHz Intel Core i5   Memory: 8 GB 1600 MHz DDR3   Graphics:  Intel HD Graphics 5000 1536 MB or better
